name: WD-40 Game
summary: A free 2001 advergame for members of the "WD-40 Fan Club". Largely forgotten about until 2022, when someone posted about it on the r/lostmedia subreddit, and a copy was located on the wayback machine.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: WD-40 Spray Game gameplay (Freeware game for the WD-40 Fan Club; 2001)
